plot: After his caravan is viciously attacked in the badlands, a badly shaken Pottinger orders Nolan to hunt down and destroy those responsible. Nolan's manhunt implicates one of Rafe's miners causing tensions to explode. Meanwhile, a vengeful Datak is determined to reclaim control over the family business.—Anonymous

While returning to Defiance, Mayor Niles Pottiger and Captain Rainer are attacked by masked raiders. Rafe is not at all happy when he finds out who is behind it all. Nolan quickly tracks down the perpetrators and the equipment they took but tries to take care of it in his own way. When Rainer manages to extract an image of the raider from her smashed camcorder, she is kidnapped. Stahma meanwhile feels that she has earned the right to be treated as a partner in Datak's business but he thinks otherwise. He does have plans for Alak and shows his men the cost of of following a woman's orders. Stahma doesn't sit idly by however.—garykmcd
